scripts.all: npm run db && npm run server
scripts.all_stop: npm run db_stop && npm run server_stop
scripts.all_status: npm run db_status && npm run server_status
scripts.db_status: if [ "`pgrep mongo`" = "" ]; then echo "Stopped⛔️"; else echo "Runnning✅"; fi;
scripts.server_status: if [ "`pgrep ScapeNode-0`" = "" ]; then echo "Stopped⛔️"; else echo "Runnning✅"; fi;
